name: QuentBlast
description: QuentBlast is a cool indie RPG, where you bowl to attack! In this thrilling game of chance, the renowned Dr. Quent Blast has taken you on as his apprentice. As he shows you the art and science behind bowling, enjoy snappy, witty dialogue. You can further refine your skills by practicing on a variety of monsters that want to steal your money. Slaying enemies may give you FunBucks, which you can use to buy weapons and ammo and such. Many items would make a good gift for Dr. Blast. Some items can be used to temporarily boost your abilities, but watch out! The protagonist, Kid, gets sick real easy when his Brain Fuel drops too low.
